short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage time and increment your productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension to manage time, with the finallity of make rest during a determinate period of work.

Features:
- Countdown personalized between 10 - 90 min.
-  Rest time personalized  between 10% -50% of time worked.
- Configure the number of repetitions of work.
- Possibility of see advice at the end of the work
- Possibility to extend te work 15 min.
- Learn about FlowTime, the technique on which the extension is based.

More features coming soon!
